About.firstParagraph: Welcome to my small corner of the internet. Here you will not find much. Go to the Things page to see a few small things I've worked on over the years. Go to the Experience page to see a few small companies I've worked with over the years. Go to the Links page to see a collection of Youtube channels I recommend checking out.
About.secondParagraph: You can press the 'a' and 'd' keys to quickly switch between themes.
About.thirdParagraph: I've recently moved to Seattle. I moved from near where I grew up in Kansas City, KS. Watching the ships come and go is captivating. Seas of grain wave nothing like the ocean.
About.fourthParagraph: My interests are pampering my cat, spending too much time on YouTube, and worrying about the future. Someday I wish to enjoy some free time and not feel guilty about it.
About.fifthParagraph: Thank you for visiting. The guestbook is currently malfunctioning, and if you would like to join the mailing list, you can be the first to know when it is fixed.

Things.cityBlock: Complex animation of a small city block coded in HTML and CSS only

descriptions.scienceAsylum: Covers physics topics in a fun approachable manner
descriptions.anton: Anton explains science, math and other complicated topics using simulations
descriptions.smarter: Covers a wide array of cool science and engineering topics, often with experimentation
descriptions.franLab: Showcases a lot of very cool technology like old display tech
descriptions.techIngredients: Channel that shows a lot of very impressive and complex home experiments
descriptions.nileRed: Chemistry channel that tuns very cool experiments
descriptions.bisqwit: Channel covering programming and computer science
descriptions.climateTown: Covers environmental topics and how fucked we all are
descriptions.technologyConnections: Goes in depth with the technology we use day to day
descriptions.huygensOptics: Channel covering optics and the physics of light
descriptions.breakingTaps: Material science and very small things
descriptions.alphaPhoenixChannel: Science channel that runs cool experiments at home
descriptions.iDidAThing: Australian dude makes things and somehow still has all his fingers
descriptions.periodicVideos: Channel covering chemistry and all the elements of the periodic table
descriptions.atomicFrontier: Covers a wide array of interesting topics
descriptions.appliedScience: Very cool home made tech and science
descriptions.captainDisillusion: Covers film and debunks fake videos
descriptions.handToolRescue: Restores and sometimes fabricates from scratch old tools
descriptions.steve: History channel covering and eating old and new MREs
descriptions.chilliChump: Cooking channel focused on cooking peppers into sauce as well as growing them

Prize.prizeLabel: Icon related to your score in this website's hidden game

About.firstParagraph: Bienvenidos a mi pequeño rincón de Internet. Aquí no encontrarás mucho. Vaya a la página Cosas para ver algunas pequeñas cosas en las que he trabajado a lo largo de los años. Vaya a la página Experiencia para ver algunas pequeñas empresas con las que he trabajado a lo largo de los años. Vaya a la página de enlaces para ver una colección de canales de Youtube que recomiendo consultar.
About.secondParagraph: Puede presionar las teclas 'a' y 'd' para cambiar rápidamente entre temas.
About.thirdParagraph: Recientemente me mudé a Seattle. Me mudé cerca de donde crecí en Kansas City, KS. Ver los barcos ir y venir es cautivador. Los mares de grano nadan como el océano.
About.fourthParagraph: Mis intereses son mimar a mi gato, pasar demasiado tiempo en YouTube y preocuparme por el futuro. Algún día deseo disfrutar de un poco de tiempo libre y no sentirme culpable por ello.
About.fifthParagraph: Gracias por su visita. El libro de visitas no funciona correctamente en este momento, y si desea unirse a la lista de correo, puede ser el primero en saber cuándo se solucionó.
